title: Pitchfork Year in Music and Club Night With RP Boo, Dazegxd, and More Announced
description: The two year-end events will take place in New York in mid-December
author: Pitchfork
excerpt: The two year-end events will take place in New York in mid-December
text: Later this month, Pitchfork Presents will host two events in New York to ring in the end of an eventful 2024. First up is Pitchfork Year in Music, a mixtape of conversations, interviews, games, and the sounds of the year. Presented by Thought Enthusiast, hosted by Deputy Director Jeremy D. Larson, and moderated by Head of Editorial Content Mano Sundaresan, the event takes place on Wednesday, December 18, and will feature conversations with critics Alphonse Pierre and Arielle Gordon, as well a special guest to be announced. The event is free and open to the public, featuring drinks from our generous sponsors, with limited RSVP available here. Location to be announced.The party continues on Thursday, December 19, with a club night featuring sets from RP Boo, Dazegxd b2b Intimacy Simulator, Anysia Kym, DJ Ess, Alphonse Pierre, and Mano. Tickets are available here, and the show will take place at a secret location to be announced via email prior to the event presented by AdHoc. Doors for the event open at 6 p.m. Eastern Standard Time, and the show starts at 7 p.m. Eastern Standard Time.
html:
Later this month, Pitchfork Presents will host two events in New York to ring in the end of an eventful 2024. First up is Pitchfork Year in Music, a mixtape of conversations, interviews, games, and the sounds of the year. Presented by Thought Enthusiast, hosted by Deputy Director Jeremy D. Larson, and moderated by Head of Editorial Content Mano Sundaresan, the event takes place on Wednesday, December 18, and will feature conversations with critics Alphonse Pierre and Arielle Gordon, as well a special guest to be announced. The event is free and open to the public, featuring drinks from our generous sponsors, with limited RSVP available here. Location to be announced.

The party continues on Thursday, December 19, with a club night featuring sets from RP Boo, Dazegxd b2b Intimacy Simulator, Anysia Kym, DJ Ess, Alphonse Pierre, and Mano. Tickets are available here, and the show will take place at a secret location to be announced via email prior to the event presented by AdHoc. Doors for the event open at 6 p.m. Eastern Standard Time, and the show starts at 7 p.m. Eastern Standard Time.
